Heya,
> I just noticed we have 'Photos' section in this group.  I expect
> all the only things put there to be screen shots.  If I find certain
> other things which I consider offensive in the Photos area, I will
> restrict access to who can upload to that area.  Unfortunately, both
> Files and Photos share the same settings for access controls.

Heh, the usual thing I see when someone discoveres a photo section is
someone asking everyone to upload pics of themselves...
Thankfully the people here are somewhat saner than those in other online
groups :)

> Is there a general way to get complete pictures of maps without using
> the print screen method?

Maybe, the scenario editor we will someday build will need to load and
display the map so you can edit it, so obviously you could grab screenshots
from that.
Only thing is I don't know how you'd go about doing that.  If we had some
details about where the map data is and where we load the images from
someone should be able to throw at least a scenario file -> map image (but
not the other way, heh) converter up and we could use it in the scenario
editor later.

Other than that, doubt it, the minimap doesn't show the entire map and it's
the only thing that gives you a large-area view...

Just for fun I added a map image export feature to the scenario editors
feature list :)

- Deathifier
